cast.name: 克里斯蒂娜·阿奎莱拉 Christina Aguilera

this_title: Christina Aguilera: Genie Gets Her Wish
introduction: Genie Gets Her Wish is a rare, candid and intimate portrait of a young and incredibily talanted artist. This official video features Christina performing her #1 smash single, "Genie In A Bottle," rare studio footage, live concert performances and exclusive peeks backstage.Scene Index:1. It Feels So Good2. The Discovery3. So Emotional4. At Last5. Genie In A Bottle6. When You Put Your Hands On Me7. The Tonight Show8. I Turn To You9. On The Road10. What A Girl Wants11. Genie In A Bottle12. The Christmas SongDVD Special Features:- Photogallery- Music Videos: Genie In A Bottle, What A Girl Wants- Web Links
